paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Window function */

SELECT 
    s.name as super, t.name as team, s.rescues,
    avg(s.rescues) OVER(PARTITION BY t.name) as team_avg
FROM 
	demo.supers s INNER JOIN
	demo.supersteams st ON s.id = st.superid INNER JOIN
	demo.teams t ON t.id = st.teamid 
ORDER BY
	t.name, s.rescues DESC

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Window function */

SELECT 
    s.name as name, s.rescues,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY t.name ORDER BY s.rescues DESC) AS rank,
    t.name as team,
    sum(rescues) OVER(PARTITION BY t.name) as team_total
FROM 
	demo.supers s INNER JOIN
	demo.supersteams st ON s.id = st.superid INNER JOIN
	demo.teams t ON t.id = st.teamid 
ORDER BY
	team_total DESC, rank ASC

paragraphs.text:
%mariadb

/* Recursive Common Table Expression */

WITH RECURSIVE heroes AS(
	SELECT id, name, mentor
	FROM demo.supers
	WHERE name = 'Robin/Nightwing' 
    UNION
    SELECT s.id, s.name, s.mentor
    FROM demo.supers AS s, heroes AS h
    WHERE s.id = h.mentor 
)
SELECT * FROM heroes;
